mapper.select: select * from subject where code = #{ code } limit 1
select * from subject where code = #{ code } and year = #{ year } and semester = #{ semester } and subjectClass = #{ subjectClass } limit 1
select * from subject where code = #{ code } and year = #{ year } and semester = #{ semester } limit 1
select * from subject where division = #{ division } and departmentId = #{ departmentId } group by code;
mapper.insert: insert into subject(year, semester, code, subjectClass, name, professorId, score, division, establish, departmentId, detailId, abolish) values(#{ year }, #{ semester }, #{ code }, #{ subjectClass }, #{ name }, #{ professorId }, #{ score }, #{ division }, #{ establish }, #{ departmentId }, #{ detailId }, #{ abolish })
